policy.principles: Principles for the processing and protection of Personal Data and information on cookies

community.title: Join out community
community.description: Join our social media list for the latest news, early access and exclusives.

home.title: A couple of words about us
home.subtitle: Every detail – for your beauty and comfort.

delivery.question: Delivery
delivery.answer: Delivery of our goods is all over Slovakia and Europe. When paying you can choose a convenient for you transportation company.

methods_of_payments.question: Methods of payment
methods_of_payments.answer: Payment for our goods is made online via PayPal.

refund.question: Refund
refund.answer:
In our store there are no refunds.
We offer you beautiful sets of good quality, each set provides a size chart. Before you make an order, control a few times your size, so that then you do not have problems with it. If you have any questions, or are not sure of your size, you can always write on our Instagram page.

about.title: We focus on quality and modern trends
about.content_1: Welcome to VIBE, your online destination for women’s lingerie! Here, you’ll find a wide selection of everyday and stylish lingerie designed to provide comfort and confidence at every moment.
about.content_2: At VIBE, we focus on quality and modern trends so you can enjoy feeling exceptional every day. Our team is dedicated to ensuring every detail meets the highest standards. Thank you for choosing VIBE!
about.subtitle: Our body is sensitive. It registers every feeling. Be tender with it.

cart-totals.tooltip: Cart total excluding shipping and taxes.

fast_delivery.title: Fast Delivery
fast_delivery.description: Your package will arrive in 3-5 business days at your pick up location or in the comfort of your home.

exchanges.title: Simple exchanges
exchanges.description: Is the fit not quite right? No worries - we'll exchange your product for a new one.

related_products.title: Related products
related_products.description: You might also want to check out these products.

sign_in.title: Sign in for a better experience.

register.title: Become a Vibe Member
register.description: Create your Vibe Store Member profile, and get access to an enhanced shopping experience.

review.title: Review
review.description: By clicking the Place Order button, you confirm that you have read, understand and accept our Terms of Use, Terms of Sale and Returns Policy and acknowledge that you have read Medusa Store's Privacy Policy.

billings.label: Billing address
billings.same: Billing and delivery address are the same.

profile.title: Profile
profile.description: View and update your profile information, including your name, email, and phone number. You can also update your billing address, or change your password.

addresses.title: Addresses
addresses.description: View and update your shipping addresses, you can add as many as you like. Saving your addresses will make them available during checkout.
addresses.use_saved: Hi {name}, do you want to use one of your saved addresses?

orders.title: Recent orders
orders.description: View your previous orders and their status. You can also create returns or exchanges for your orders if needed.
orders.no_orders_description: You don't have any orders yet, let us change that :)

cart.empty: You don't have anything in your cart. Let's change that, use the link below to start browsing our products.
